description: Universal DMT classification for electronic parts with fixed-width codes and per-item sequence

segments.XXX: Per-item sequence 001-999 to ensure uniqueness per TTFFCCSS

cross_cutting_class_codes.96: Cables that belong to this family

families.name: RF ICs (LNA Mixer PA Switch Front-end)
LED Optics Lenses Reflectors Light Pipes
Transformers (Power Pulse Current Sense SMPS Audio)
Wire to Board and Wire to Wire
Cable Management (Ties Shrink Sleeving Labels Ducts)
ESD Bags Mats Straps Ionizers Testers
Irons Stations Hot Air Tips Nozzles
Power Supply and Power Management Boards

cc.40: Programmable Logic PAL GAL PLD CPLD FPGA

ss.11: 74F FAST FCT FCTT ABT ALS AS
ss.14: TinyLogic AUC AUP AXP NC7 NCV7

0308_Microcontrollers_SoC.notes: CC encodes core class. SS encodes vendor family bucket so you can locate STM32F1 etc. Use XXX to differentiate individual part numbers inside the same SS.

cc.09: Wireless MCUs (BLE BT Wi Fi Thread Zigbee SubGHz)
cc.11: ARM Cortex R class (R4 R5 R7 safety MCUs)

ss_vendor_families.15: ST STM32 W or WB or WL (wireless)
ss_vendor_families.23: Microchip ATSAM D or E or C
ss_vendor_families.27: TI SimpleLink CC13x or CC26x or CC32xx
ss_vendor_families.38: Espressif ESP32 S or C or H lines
ss_vendor_families.51: Bouffalo BL6x or BL70x or BL808

cc.90: Precision or low thermal EMF type
